artist: Painter: After Jacob van der Heyden; Artist: Nicolas Colibert
description: Street scene; shepherd and mounted shepherdess with cows and goats; dog left foreground in archway; tower with gate up; church and buildings behind city walls
inscription:

in plate in black: [ 112/ Vander Hayden Pinx   Colibert Sc/Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain/]; on sheet in pencil: [1-536]
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravés d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de Mr. Poullain, plate 112
